post.text: More people are voting in this election than ever before. Make a plan to vote today: hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Sara
comment.text: When the president of the city division of the SEPTA union led a six-day strike in 2009, he referred to himself as "the most hated man in Philadelphia." I heard Trump payed him a lot of money on the down low to strike before the election so the poor and the old won't be able to vote for Hillary Omg hope this is not true

replies.author: Brittany
replies.text: Lol. Wow, that's so amazingly false. Got any facts? Any sources? I can make some stuff up too.

replies.author: Sara
replies.text: oh shut Brittany I don't need facts I really do care about Trump

replies.author: Brittany
replies.text: Sara so that gives you the right to just make things up? Hmmm. Yup, you're meant to be a democrat...
